TopicTitle: Developers don't use the best possible textures?

Articles.Content: I recently landed on a dune (not very successfully), but the main thing I noticed is that the resolution of the texture of the scatter elements is better than the rest of the Dune surface. What do you think?(can you tell me how I can attach my screenshots?)

2 minutes ago, Dmitr said:

(can you tell me how I can attach my screenshots?)

Welcome to the forum! Please upload your images to a service like google drive or imgur and then link to them here.
